TITLE: EXPLORE WHEEL CHOICES
DESCRIPTION: Each Encore trim package comes with its own unique wheels and distinctive style.  Discover which wheel design meets your unique taste.

TITLE: POWER MOONROOF
DESCRIPTION: The available expansive power moonroof on the 2019 Encore small luxury SUV takes passengers from their seats to breathtaking views, with just a press of a button.

TITLE: PREMIUM LED LIGHTING
DESCRIPTION: The LED daytime running lamps feature a unique lighting pattern that’s a Buick design signature, while its standard LED-accented taillamps reflect its unique sporty personality.

TITLE: SPORT EXHAUST TIP
DESCRIPTION: The distinctive flourish of Encore's standard stainless steel exhaust tip contributes to its athletic exterior style.

TITLE: HEATED STEERING WHEEL
DESCRIPTION: Experience an extra layer of warmth and luxury with Encore's available leather-wrapped heated steering wheel.

TITLE: HEATED FRONT SEATS
DESCRIPTION: Combat cooler temperatures with the soothing warmth of the available heated driver and front-passenger leather seats.

TITLE: KEYLESS OPEN AND PUSH-BUTTON START
DESCRIPTION: With Keyless Open and Push-Button Start, you can unlock your doors and start your Encore without your keys leaving your side. And with available Remote Vehicle Start on the myBuick app†, you can warm up or cool down your Encore SUV before you even step inside.

TITLE: FLEXIBLE CARGO SPACE
DESCRIPTION: With fold-flat front-passenger and folding second-row seats, the Encore small SUV provides the flexibility to accommodate your everyday life.

TITLE: QUIETTUNING TECHNOLOGY
DESCRIPTION: QuietTuningTM technology with Active Noise Cancellation creates a hushed interior by utilizing its triple door seals, acoustic laminated windshield and front side window glass to reduce, block and absorb outside noises.

TITLE: CLIMATE CONTROL AND IN-VEHICLE AIR IONIZER
DESCRIPTION: The available dual-zone climate controls allow passengers to personalize their preferred temperatures. And the available in-vehicle ionization system leaves the air cleaner and fresher inside your Encore.

TITLE: SIDE BLIND ZONE ALERT
DESCRIPTION: Available Side Blind Zone Alert provides side-mirror notifications to help you avoid a moving vehicle detected in your blind zone during a lane-change maneuver.

TITLE: FORWARD COLLISION ALERT
DESCRIPTION: If the available Forward Collision Alert detects that a front-end collision situation is imminent while following a detected vehicle, the system alerts you to a potential crash. It also alerts you if you are following a detected vehicle much too closely.

TITLE: LANE DEPARTURE WARNING
DESCRIPTION: Available Lane Departure Warning provides alerts to help you avoid crashes due to unintentionally drifting out of your lane when your turn signal is not activated.

TITLE: ONSTAR SAFETY AND SECURITY
DESCRIPTION: With available OnStar® by your side, you’ll feel confident and ready for the road ahead with available features such as Automatic Crash Response†, Emergency Services and Roadside Assistance†.

TITLE: REAR CROSS TRAFFIC ALERT
DESCRIPTION: When in Reverse, available Rear Cross Traffic Alert provides alerts to help you avoid approaching detected left-or right-cross traffic (e.g., out of a crowded parking space or driveway with side obstructions).

TITLE: REAR VISION CAMERA WITH AVAILABLE REAR PARK ASSIST
DESCRIPTION: The Rear Vision Camera helps you back up with confidence by projecting what’s behind you with guidelines on the color touch-screen, located in the center display.

TITLE: BUICK INFOTAINMENT SYSTEM
DESCRIPTION: The Buick Infotainment System† allows you to make hands-free calls, access your favorite SiriusXM† Satellite Radio stations and more. Plus, you can travel confidently with available built-in Navigation,† all through the available high-resolution 8" diagonal color touch-screen.

TITLE: APPLE CARPLAYTM COMPATIBILITY
DESCRIPTION: Plug in your compatible iPhone® to Apple CarPlayTM† and have easy access to your music and maps, and be able to make phone calls, send messages and more—all through your vehicle’s touch-screen or with your voice through Siri.®

TITLE: ANDROID AUTOTM COMPATIBILITY
DESCRIPTION: Android AutoTM† seamlessly connects your compatible smartphone to access your favorite apps, text messages and music. And with hands-free, voice-activated technology, you can keep your world moving while you're on the move.

TITLE: BUILT-IN 4G LTE WI-FI HOTSPOT
DESCRIPTION: Stay connected to your world, even when you’re on the go, with your vehicle’s available built-in 4G LTE Wi-Fi® hotspot†. It offers a fast and reliable connection and supports up to seven devices so your passengers can stream, surf and post their way at 4G LTE speed.

TITLE: NAVIGATION
DESCRIPTION: Access real-time traffic data, get directions or save favorite routes and destinations with Encore's available built in Navigation† System.

TITLE: MYBUICK APP
DESCRIPTION: The available myBuick app† lets you perform a number of vehicle functions right from your mobile device. Remotely start and stop† your engine, lock and unlock your doors, check your tire pressure† and get real-time diagnostics from almost anywhere.

TITLE: BUICK CONNECTED SERVICES
DESCRIPTION: Buick now offers three ways to seamlessly link your digital life to your connected vehicle. You decide which plan is right for you. Get Connected Access† with 10 years of standard connectivity, which enables services such as Buick Smart Driver† and Vehicle Diagnostics† at no additional cost. Add either Remote Access† or Unlimited Access† to connect to more available features, such as remote vehicle start† and unlimited 4G LTE Wi-Fi®† data.

TITLE: TURBOCHARGED PERFORMANCE
DESCRIPTION: The standard 138-hp 1.4L Turbo engine serves up 148 lb-ft of torque, offering a sporty performance, impressive responsiveness and surprising efficiency.

TITLE: ALL-WHEEL DRIVE
DESCRIPTION: To optimize traction, choose available intelligent All-Wheel Drive that constantly monitors all four wheels and transfers power between wheels when needed.

TITLE: STABILITRAK
DESCRIPTION: When Encore senses a difference between the direction of the wheels and the steering wheel, the StabiliTrak electronic stability control system can apply quick, precise force to the brakes to help you stay confidently in command of the road ahead.

TITLE: NIMBLE HANDLING
DESCRIPTION: The agile design and tight turning radius not only make the Encore SUV fun to drive, they help you navigate winding roads more confidently.

TITLE: SIGNATURE STYLING
DESCRIPTION: Scan the sculpted lines and sleek curves of the New 2019 Envision and see what happens when an SUV is designed to a higher level of refinement.

TITLE: MODERN LIGHTING
DESCRIPTION: The New 2019 Envision compact luxury SUV confidently announces its presence with bright, crisp available LED-accented headlamps and new low-profile LED-enhanced taillamps.

TITLE: STRIKING STANCE
DESCRIPTION: The New 2019 Envision makes a lasting impression from every angle. At the forefront of the refreshed exterior: the unmistakable Buick grille and tricolor insignia.

TITLE: HANDS-FREE POWER LIFTGATE
DESCRIPTION: True luxury is in the little things, like a standard hands-free power liftgate that helps you access your cargo area without lifting a finger.

TITLE: PANORAMIC MOONROOF
DESCRIPTION: Treat your passengers to expansive views of the sky with the New 2019 Envision compact luxury SUV’s available panoramic moonroof.

TITLE: UNIQUE WHEELS
DESCRIPTION: Depending on the Envision trim level you choose, you’ll get distinctive wheels that complement the rest of your vehicle’s bold exterior. The 19" aluminum wheels (shown) are standard on Premium and Premium II models.

TITLE: SPACIOUS SECOND ROW
DESCRIPTION: The Envision offers spacious seating for up to five people. For even more space, the second-row seat can slide back to create nearly 7" of additional leg room.

TITLE: HEATED STEERING WHEEL
DESCRIPTION: When outside temperatures drop, revel in the soothing warmth of an available heated, leather-wrapped steering wheel.

TITLE: INTUITIVE CENTER STACK AND CONSOLE
DESCRIPTION: The Envision SUV’s intuitive center stack puts important features and controls at your fingertips, while its dual-winged center console is spacious and can be easily reached from the second row.

TITLE: QUIETTUNING
DESCRIPTION: Buick QuietTuningTM technologies such as triple door seals and acoustic laminated glass in the windshield and front side windows help block outside noises and allow conversations in the New 2019 Envision to flourish.

TITLE: REFINED INTERIOR
DESCRIPTION: The New 2019 Envision is easy to get into and hard to leave. From its spacious cargo area and available cooled front seats, to its soft-touch materials and modern amenities, every detail works in harmony to enhance every moment.

TITLE: AIR IONIZER
DESCRIPTION: An available in-vehicle ionization systems helps leave the air fresher.

TITLE: COOLED FRONT SEATS
DESCRIPTION: A feature you’ll find especially valuable during warm summer days, available cooled front seats help both the driver and front passenger stay refreshed.

TITLE: REAR-SEAT CLIMATE CONTROLS
DESCRIPTION: Available tri-zone HVAC automatic climate controls allow rear passengers to personalize the air temperature in the second row.

TITLE: SURROUND VISION
DESCRIPTION: This available system provides you with an overhead virtual “bird’s eye” view of the scene around your vehicle on a center-stack display, and helps you park and avoid crashes with nearby objects during low-speed maneuvering.

TITLE: LANE CHANGE ALERT WITH SIDE BLIND ZONE ALERT
DESCRIPTION: This available feature can provide side-mirror alerts to help you avoid moving vehicles detected either in your side blind zone, or rapidly approaching this zone during a lane-change maneuver.

TITLE: REAR CROSS TRAFFIC ALERT
DESCRIPTION: When in Reverse, available Rear Cross Traffic Alert can provide alerts to help you avoid approaching detected left or right cross traffic such as when pulling out of a crowded parking space or driveway with side obstructions.

TITLE: LANE KEEP ASSIST WITH LANE DEPARTURE WARNING
DESCRIPTION: Available Lane Keep Assist with Lane Departure Warning can provide gentle steering-wheel turns to help you avoid unintentionally drifting out of your lane when you are not actively steering and your turn signal is not activated. It also can provide lane departure warnings if needed.

TITLE: INTELLIGENT AIRBAG SYSTEM
DESCRIPTION: In the event of a collision, the New 2019 Envision offers ten standard airbags† to help reduce the risk of injury to vehicle occupants during certain collisions.

TITLE: FORWARD COLLISION ALERT
DESCRIPTION: If this available system detects that a front-end collision situation is imminent while following a detected vehicle, the system alerts you to a potential crash. The system can also alert you if you're following a detected vehicle much too closely.

TITLE: SAFETY ALERT SEAT
DESCRIPTION: The available GM-patented Safety Alert Seat provides you with the option of getting haptic seat-bottom vibration pulses instead of audible crash avoidance alerts.

TITLE: FORWARD AUTOMATIC BRAKING
DESCRIPTION: Available Enhanced Automatic Emergency Braking can alert you when a front-end collision is detected to be imminent with a vehicle ahead you are following. It also can help reduce the collision’s severity or avoid the collision by automatically applying brakes if you have not already, or by enhancing driver braking.

TITLE: DRIVER INFORMATION CENTER
DESCRIPTION: The Envision SUV’s Driver Information Center conveniently displays fuel level, outside temperature, compass and other information to help you stay connected to what’s going on inside and outside of your vehicle.

TITLE: HEAD-UP DISPLAY
DESCRIPTION: The available Head-Up Display projects critical information such as your speed onto the windshield to help you keep your eyes on the road ahead.

TITLE: APPLE CARPLAYTM COMPATIBILITY
DESCRIPTION: With Apple CarPlayTM compatibility†, you can access Apple Music and Apple Maps, make phone calls, send messages and more all through your Envision touch-screen or with your voice through Siri®.

TITLE: ANDROID AUTOTM COMPATIBILITY
DESCRIPTION: Android AutoTM compatibility† seamlessly connects your compatible smartphone so you can get directions using Google Maps, listen to music via Google Play Music and more using your Envision touch-screen.

TITLE: BUILT-IN 4G LTE WI-FI HOTSPOT
DESCRIPTION: Stay connected to your world, even when you’re on the go, with your vehicle’s available built-in 4G LTE Wi-Fi® hotspot†. It offers a fast and reliable connection and supports up to seven devices so your passengers can stream, surf and post their way at 4G LTE speed.

TITLE: BUICK INFOTAINMENT SYSTEM
DESCRIPTION: Play music, make hands-free calls and more with the Buick Infotainment System†. Plus, access real-time maps, driving directions and more with available built-in Navigation†, all through your 8" diagonal high-resolution color touch-screen.

TITLE: WIRELESS CHARGING
DESCRIPTION: Keep your smartphone charged and your cabin clutter-free with the help of available wireless charging†. Just place your compatible device inside the pocket in front of the center console and charge with ease.

TITLE: TEEN DRIVER
DESCRIPTION: Teen Driver mode helps you coach your teen’s driving behaviors — even when you’re not there. Set a speed alert and audio volume limit and automatically enable many available active safety features. Then, use the in-vehicle report card to track your teen’s performance behind the wheel.

TITLE: BUICK CONNECTED SERVICES
DESCRIPTION: Buick now offers three ways to seamlessly link your digital life to your connected vehicle. You decide which plan is right for you. Get Connected Access† with 10 years of standard connectivity, which enables services such as Buick Smart Driver† and Vehicle Diagnostics† at no additional cost. Add either Remote Access† or Unlimited Access† to connect to more available features, such as remote vehicle start† and unlimited 4G LTE Wi-Fi®† data.

TITLE: ENGINE OPTIONS
DESCRIPTION: Press the Start button and the spirited response of your Envision comes from one of two sources: the standard 2.5L engine with 197 HP and 192 lb-ft of torque or the available 2.0L Turbo engine with 252 HP and 295 lb-ft of torque.

TITLE: IMPRESSIVE RIDE AND HANDLING
DESCRIPTION: The available HiPer Strut front suspension provides Envision with responsive steering and cornering while helping dampen road noise and vibration.

TITLE: INTELLIGENT ALL-WHEEL DRIVE
DESCRIPTION: Available intelligent All-Wheel Drive with active twin clutch automatically adjusts torque to each wheel to optimize traction and respond before slip occurs.

TITLE: NEW 9-SPEED TRANSMISSION
DESCRIPTION: The available 2.0L Turbo engine works in tandem with the new 9-speed automatic transmission to help power flow smoothly from the engine to the road.

TITLE: STOP/START TECHNOLOGY
DESCRIPTION: To help reduce fuel consumption†, seamless Stop/Start technology automatically shuts down the engine when your Envision comes to a stop under certain driving conditions, such as at a stoplight. The engine automatically restarts when you release your foot from the brake. New for 2019, you can turn this feature on or off with the touch of a button.

TITLE: ADAPTIVE CRUISE CONTROL
DESCRIPTION: Available Adaptive Cruise Control† enhances regular Cruise Control by automatically adapting your speed to help you maintain the selected following gap between your Envision SUV and the vehicles detected ahead. This reduces the need for constant braking and accelerating.

TITLE: TOWING CAPABILITY
DESCRIPTION: Redefine your weekend routine with the Enclave SUV’s available trailering package. It offers the confidence and convenience of up to 5,000 lbs of towing capability†, so you can pack more into every getaway.

TITLE: POWER LIFTGATE
DESCRIPTION: Access your cargo area without lifting a finger thanks to the standard hands-free power liftgate with LED logo projection. It marks where to kick, making the liftgate easy to activate even when your hands are full.

TITLE: POWER MOONROOF
DESCRIPTION: At the touch of a button, tilt or slide the available power moonroof with rear fixed skylight to treat your passengers to expansive views of the sky.

TITLE: SIGNATURE GRILLE
DESCRIPTION: Distinguished by chrome wings, intricate surfaces and the Buick tricolor badge, the signature Buick grille helps Enclave make a lasting first impression.

TITLE: WINGED LED HEADLAMPS
DESCRIPTION: Winged LED headlamps provide brilliant light to help cut through darkness and illuminate your way.

TITLE: SEATING & CARGO FLEXIBILITY
DESCRIPTION: Around the block or out for the weekend, the Enclave midsize luxury SUV makes room for up to seven people with flexible cargo space and three rows of first-class seating.

TITLE: THOUGHTFUL APPOINTMENTS
DESCRIPTION: Warm wood tones, brushed-chrome accents and available heated, leather-appointed first-and second-row seating come together to delight your senses.

TITLE: SPACIOUS, FLEXIBLE SEATING
DESCRIPTION: Enclave offers cargo flexibility for life on the go. With the pull of a handle, the Smart Slide second-row seating glides back to enable easy third-row access. And with the push of a button, the available power-folding split third-row seating can be easily lowered or raised.

TITLE: QUIETTUNING TECHNOLOGY
DESCRIPTION: To make sure nothing interrupts you and your passengers’ time together, Enclave utilizes triple door sealing, acoustic laminated glass, specific suspension tuning and other technologies to reduce, block and absorb unwanted noise.

TITLE: LANE CHANGE ALERT WITH SIDE BLIND ZONE ALERT
DESCRIPTION: This available feature can provide side-mirror alerts to help you avoid moving vehicles detected either in your side blind zone, or rapidly approaching this zone during a lane-change maneuver.

TITLE: REAR CROSS TRAFFIC ALERT
DESCRIPTION: When in Reverse, available Rear Cross Traffic Alert can provide alerts to help you avoid approaching detected left or right cross traffic such as when pulling out of a crowded parking space or driveway with side obstructions.

DESCRIPTION: If this available system detects that a front-end collision situation is imminent while following a detected vehicle, the system alerts you to a potential crash. The system can also alert you if you're following a detected vehicle much too closely.

TITLE: ENHANCED AUTOMATIC EMERGENCY BRAKING
DESCRIPTION: Available Enhanced Automatic Emergency Braking can alert you when a front-end collision is detected to be imminent with a vehicle ahead you are following. It also can help reduce the collision’s severity or avoid the collision by automatically applying brakes if you have not already, or by enhancing driver braking.

TITLE: SURROUND VISION
DESCRIPTION: Available Surround Vision provides you with an overhead virtual “bird’s-eye” view of the scene around your vehicle on a center-stack display and helps you park and avoid obstacles during low-speed maneuvering.

TITLE: LANE KEEP ASSIST WITH LANE DEPARTURE WARNING
DESCRIPTION: Available Lane Keep Assist with Lane Departure Warning can provide gentle steering-wheel turns to help you avoid unintentionally drifting out of your lane when you are not actively steering and your turn signal is not activated. It also can provide lane departure warnings if needed.

TITLE: ONSTAR SAFETY & SECURITY
DESCRIPTION: With available OnStar® by your side, you’ll feel confident and ready for the road ahead with available features such as Automatic Crash Response†, Emergency Services and Roadside Assistance†.

TITLE: BUICK INFOTAINMENT SYSTEM
DESCRIPTION: Place and receive hands-free calls, get text-message alerts† and enjoy other convenient features —all through your vehicle’s 8" diagonal Buick Infotainment System† touch-screen.

TITLE: APPLE CARPLAYTM COMPATIBILITY
DESCRIPTION: With Apple CarPlayTM compatibility†, you can access Apple Music and Apple Maps, place phone calls, send messages and more, all through your vehicle’s high-resolution touch-screen or with your voice through Siri®.

TITLE: ANDROID AUTOTM COMPATIBILITY
DESCRIPTION: Android AutoTM compatibility† connects your compatible smartphone so you can get directions using Google Maps, listen to music via Google Play Music and more—all while keeping your eyes on the road ahead.

TITLE: BUILT-IN 4G LTE WI-FI HOTSPOT
DESCRIPTION: Stay connected to your world, even when you’re on the go, with your vehicle’s available built-in 4G LTE Wi-Fi® hotspot†. It offers a fast and reliable connection and supports up to seven devices so your passengers can stream, surf and post their way at 4G LTE speed.

TITLE: NAVIGATION
DESCRIPTION: Experience the convenience of real-time maps, turn-by-turn directions and more with the Enclave SUV’s available Navigation system†.

TITLE: BUICK CONNECTED SERVICES
DESCRIPTION: Buick now offers three ways to seamlessly link your digital life to your connected vehicle. You decide which plan is right for you. Get Connected Access† with 10 years of standard connectivity, which enables services such as Buick Smart Driver† and Vehicle Diagnostics† at no additional cost. Add either Remote Access† or Unlimited Access† to connect to more available features, such as remote vehicle start† and unlimited 4G LTE Wi-Fi®† data.

TITLE: INTELLIGENT ALL-WHEEL DRIVE
DESCRIPTION: Available intelligent All-Wheel Drive with active twin clutch automatically activates when you need it most by delivering optimal power and traction to the wheel(s) with the best grip when road conditions are less than ideal.

TITLE: FIVE-LINK REAR SUSPENSION
DESCRIPTION: The innovative five-link rear suspension system assures a smooth ride and confident handling by providing responsive steering, improved cornering and reduced noise and vibration.

TITLE: 3.6L V6 ENGINE
DESCRIPTION: The 3.6L V6 engine works in tandem with a 9-speed automatic transmission to deliver 310-HP and efficient performance. Enclave with FWD achieves an EPA-estimated 18 city/26 hwy mpg, while Enclave with AWD gets an EPA-estimated 17 city/25 hwy mpg.

TITLE: STOP/START TECHNOLOGY
DESCRIPTION: To help reduce fuel consumption, seamless Stop/Start technology automatically shuts down the engine when your Enclave comes to a stop under certain driving conditions, such as at a stoplight. The engine automatically restarts when you release your foot from the brake.

TITLE: RESPONSIVE DESIGN
DESCRIPTION: Enclave was engineered with materials designed to yield a light and strong body structure. The result: an agile and responsive driving experience.

TITLE: ROOF RAILS & CROSSBARS
DESCRIPTION: Whether your travels take you to the rapids, trails or beach, standard integrated aluminum roof rails and available dealer-installed accessory cargo crossbars make it easy to attach and carry† all kinds of gear.

TITLE: HANDS-FREE POWER LIFTGATE
DESCRIPTION: A convenient LED illumination projection on the ground marks where to kick, making the available hands-free power liftgate easy to activate, even when your hands are full.

TITLE: PANORAMIC MOONROOF
DESCRIPTION: Treat your passengers to expansive views of the open sky with a power panoramic moonroof, available in the 2019 Regal TourX luxury wagon.

TITLE: SIGNATURE LIGHTING
DESCRIPTION: LED signature lighting, fog lamps and available advanced LED headlamps with auto-leveling technology brighten your travels, while an eye-catching arrival sequence lights the way as you approach or exit your vehicle.

TITLE: KEYLESS OPEN AND START
DESCRIPTION: Unlock and open the doors of your TourX with the touch of a button, all while leaving your key fob in your pocket or purse, thanks to keyless entry and a push-button start.

TITLE: 18" ALUMINUM WHEELS
DESCRIPTION: The 18" aluminum TourX wheels are rugged yet refined, while the tires are equipped with technologies designed to reduce interior noise on most road surfaces. Additionally, wheel moldings help protect your vehicle from rocks and debris.

TITLE: GET TO KNOW YOUR TOURX FEATURES
DESCRIPTION: Learn how to use the exterior features and adventure-ready accessories in your TourX.

TITLE: VERSATILE REAR SEATING
DESCRIPTION: Standard 60/40 or available 40/20/40 split rear seating quickly reconfigures the cabin to enable various combinations of cargo and passengers. And with up to 73.5 cu. ft.† of cargo space behind the front row with the rear seats folded, you’ll find generous space for whatever you’re bringing with you.

TITLE: QUIETTUNING TECHNOLOGY
DESCRIPTION: To make sure nothing interrupts you and your passengers’ time together, QuietTuningTM technology uses triple door sealing, acoustic laminated glass in the windshield and front windows, specific suspension tuning and many other measures to help reduce, block and absorb unwanted noise.

TITLE: PREMIUM AMENITIES
DESCRIPTION: As you venture off the beaten path, surround yourself with available amenities like ambient lighting and an available heated steering wheel that put you instantly at ease.

TITLE: DU­AL-ZONE CLIMATE CONTROL
DESCRIPTION: The available dual-zone automatic climate control system allows the driver and front passenger to personalize the temperature on their side of the cabin.

TITLE: LEATHER-APPOINTED SEATING
DESCRIPTION: Available leather-appointed seating embraces both the front and back rows, while available heated front-row seats provide welcome relief on cold days.

TITLE: BOSE PREMIUM AUDIO
DESCRIPTION: The available eight-speaker Bose® premium audio system emits clean, crisp audio throughout the interior.

TITLE: AIR IONIZER
DESCRIPTION: The new available in-vehicle air ionizer is designed to help keep the air in your cabin fresher by reducing pollen, dust and debris.

TITLE: ENHANCED AUTOMATIC EMERGENCY BRAKING
DESCRIPTION: If available Enhanced Automatic Emergency Braking detects that a front-end collision is imminent while following a detected vehicle and you have not applied the brakes, the system automatically applies the brakes to help reduce the collision's severity. When traveling at very low speeds, the technology may even help you avoid the collision altogether.

DESCRIPTION: When in Reverse, available Rear Cross Traffic Alert can provide alerts to help you avoid  approaching detected left or right cross traffic such as when pulling out of a crowded parking space or driveway with side obstructions.

DESCRIPTION: Available Lane Keep Assist with Lane Departure Warning can provide gentle steering-wheel turns to help you avoid unintentionally drifting out of your lane when you are not actively steering and your turn signal is not activated. It also can provide lane departure warnings if needed.

TITLE: NEXT-GENERATION BUICK INFOTAINMENT
DESCRIPTION: The next-generation Buick Infotainment System† takes your in-vehicle experience to the next level. Place hands-free calls, download in-vehicle apps, seamlessly integrate your smartphone and more. Plus, set up a personal profile and experience new features such as available Connected Navigation†.

TITLE: BUILT-IN WI-FI HOTSPOT
DESCRIPTION: Stay connected to your world, even when you’re on the go, with your vehicle’s available built-in Wi-Fi hotspot†. It offers a fast and reliable connection and supports up to seven devices so your passengers can stream, surf and post their way at 4G LTE speed.

TITLE: WIRELESS CHARGING
DESCRIPTION: Available wireless charging† helps keep your smartphone powered and your cabin clutter-free. Simply place your compatible device inside the slot in the center console and let your phone recharge.

TITLE: APPLE CARPLAY TM COMPATIBILITY
DESCRIPTION: With Apple CarPlayTM compatibility†, you can access Apple MusicTM and Apple Maps, make phone calls, send messages and more, all through your TourX touch-screen or with your voice through Siri.®

TITLE: ANDROID AUTO TM COMPATIBILITY
DESCRIPTION: Android AutoTM compatibility† connects your compatible smartphone so you can get directions using Google Maps, listen to music via Google Play Music and enjoy other features — all while keeping your eyes on the road ahead.

Get Connected Access† with 10 years of standard connectivity, which enables services such as Buick Smart Driver† and Vehicle Diagnostics† at no additional cost. Add either the Remote Access Plan† or Unlimited Access Plan† to connect to more available features, such as remote vehicle start† and unlimited 4G LTE Wi-Fi† data.

TITLE: GET TO KNOW YOUR TOURX FEATURES
DESCRIPTION: Learn how to use the connectivity features and adventure-ready accessories in your TourX.

TITLE: INTELLIGENT ALL-WHEEL DRIVE
DESCRIPTION: To help maximize traction, intelligent All-Wheel Drive with active twin clutch sends power to the wheel(s) with the most grip in slippery weather conditions and helps improve cornering and acceleration on dry roads.

TITLE: 2.0L TURBO ENGINE
DESCRIPTION: The TourX luxury wagon is powered by a 2.0L turbocharged engine that delivers 250 HP and 295 lb-ft of torque. It’s just the right balance of power and fuel efficiency†.

TITLE: FIVE-LINK REAR SUSPENSION
DESCRIPTION: The five-link rear suspension balances agile handling with ride smoothness and quietness to help ensure excellent driving performance every time you take the wheel.

TITLE: 8-SPEED AUTOMATIC TRANSMISSION
DESCRIPTION: An 8-speed automatic transmission empowers quick, seamless rides. For more control, shift to manual mode by sliding the gear to the left.

TITLE: STABILITRAK
DESCRIPTION: To give you more confidence on icy, wet or uneven roads, StabiliTrak automatically intervenes when it senses loss of traction to help you maintain control.

TITLE: SPORTBACK OPENING
DESCRIPTION: Discreetly integrated into the design is an innovative rear sportback opening. Wide, deep and spacious, the opening can accommodate cargo in various shapes and sizes — especially when the rear seats are folded.

TITLE: LED HEADLAMPS
DESCRIPTION: Available LED headlamps with cornering and auto-leveling feature an eye-catching arrival sequence that lights the way as you approach and exit your vehicle.

TITLE: POWER MOONROOF
DESCRIPTION: Regal Sportback delivers expansive views of the sky with its available power moonroof. At the touch of a button, tilt or slide it back to find the perfect setting.

TITLE: DISTINCTIVE STYLING
DESCRIPTION: From its signature grille to its striking LED-accented taillamps, the Regal Sportback luxury sedan impresses from every angle.

TITLE: UNIQUE WHEEL DESIGNS
DESCRIPTION: Whichever trim level you choose, Regal Sportback offers distinctive, eye-catching wheels that complement the rest of your vehicle’s exterior.

TITLE: REFINED DETAILS
DESCRIPTION: With available heated, leather-appointed front seats, available ambient lighting and a host of other amenities, Regal Sportback is masterfully crafted to put you instantly at ease.

TITLE: CARGO VERSATILITY
DESCRIPTION: Bring more along for the drive with Regal Sportback’s rear sportback opening, as well as its standard 60/40 or available 40/20/40 split-folding rear-seat configurations. Lower the rear seats to create the maximum 60.7 cu. ft.† of available cargo space.

TITLE: QUIETTUNING TECHNOLOGY
DESCRIPTION: QuietTuningTM technology uses triple door sealing, acoustic laminated glass in the windshield and front windows, specific suspension tuning and many other measures to help reduce, block and absorb unwanted noise for an incredibly quiet driving experience.

TITLE: AIR IONIZER
DESCRIPTION: The new available air ionizer is designed to help keep the air in your cabin fresher by reducing pollen, dust and debris.

TITLE: LEATHER APPOINTED SEATS
DESCRIPTION: Available leather-appointed seats with French contrast stitching speak to the elevated craftsmanship of the interior.

TITLE: MEMORY SETTINGS
DESCRIPTION: The driver seat is available with an integrated memory feature that lets you set and recall seat and side-mirror positions for two drivers.

TITLE: HEATED STEERING WHEEL
DESCRIPTION: The Regal Sportback luxury sedan’s available heated, leather-wrapped steering wheel is expertly contoured to enhance your command of the road.

TITLE: LANE CHANGE ALERT WITH SIDE BLIND ZONE ALERT
DESCRIPTION: This available feature can provide side-mirror alerts to help you avoid moving vehicles detected either in your side blind zone, or rapidly approaching this zone during a lane-change maneuver.

TITLE: ENHANCED AUTOMATIC EMERGENCY BRAKING
DESCRIPTION: Available Enhanced Automatic Emergency Braking can alert you when a front-end collision is detected to be imminent with a vehicle ahead you are following. It also can help reduce the collision’s severity or avoid the collision by automatically applying brakes if you have not already, or by enhancing driver braking.

TITLE: REAR CROSS TRAFFIC ALERT
DESCRIPTION: When in Reverse, available Rear Cross Traffic Alert can provide alerts to help you avoid  approaching detected left or right cross traffic such as when pulling out of a crowded parking space or driveway with side obstructions.

TITLE: LANE KEEP ASSIST WITH LANE DEPARTURE WARNING
DESCRIPTION: Available Lane Keep Assist with Lane Departure Warning can provide gentle steering-wheel turns to help you avoid unintentionally drifting out of your lane when you are not actively steering and your turn signal is not activated. It also can provide lane departure warnings if needed.

TITLE: FORWARD COLLISION ALERT
DESCRIPTION: If this available system detects that a front-end collision situation is imminent while following a detected vehicle, the system alerts you to a potential crash. The system can also alert you if you're following a detected vehicle much too closely.

TITLE: ONSTAR SAFETY AND SECURITY
DESCRIPTION: With available OnStar® by your side, you’ll feel confident and ready for the road ahead with available features such as Automatic Crash Response†, Emergency Services and Roadside Assistance†.

TITLE: NEXT-GENERATION BUICK INFOTAINMENT
DESCRIPTION: The next-generation Buick Infotainment System† takes your in-vehicle experience to the next level. Place hands-free calls, download in-vehicle apps, seamlessly integrate your smartphone and more. Plus, set up a personal profile and experience new features such as available Connected Navigation†.

TITLE: BUILT-IN WI-FI HOTSPOT
DESCRIPTION: Stay connected to your world, even when you’re on the go, with your vehicle’s available built-in Wi-Fi hotspot†. It offers a fast and reliable connection and supports up to seven devices so your passengers can stream, surf and post at 4G LTE speed.

TITLE: WIRELESS CHARGING
DESCRIPTION: Available wireless charging† helps keep your smartphone powered and your cabin clutter-free. Simply place your compatible device inside the slot in the center console and let your phone recharge.

TITLE: APPLE CARPLAYTM COMPATIBILITY
DESCRIPTION: With Apple CarPlayTM compatibility†, you can access Apple MusicTM and Apple Maps, make phone calls, send messages and more, all through your Regal Sportback luxury sedan’s touch-screen or with your voice through Siri.®

TITLE: ANDROID AUTO
DESCRIPTION: Android AutoTM compatibility† connects your compatible smartphone so you can get directions using Google Maps, listen to music via Google Play Music and enjoy other features — all while keeping your eyes on the road ahead.

TITLE: BOSE PREMIUM AUDIO
DESCRIPTION: The available eight-speaker Bose® premium audio system emits clean, crisp audio throughout the Regal Sportback interior.

TITLE: MYBUICK APP
DESCRIPTION: The available myBuick app† lets you perform a number of vehicle functions right from your mobile device. Remotely start and stop† your engine, lock and unlock your doors, check your tire pressure† and get real-time diagnostics from almost anywhere.

TITLE: BUICK CONNECTED SERVICES
DESCRIPTION: Buick now offers three ways to connect your vehicle. You decide which services are right for you. Get Connected Access† with 10 years of standard connectivity, which enables services such as Buick Smart Driver† and Vehicle Diagnostics† at no additional cost. Add either the Remote Access Plan† or Unlimited Access Plan† to connect to more available features, such as remote vehicle start† and unlimited 4G LTE Wi-Fi† data.

TITLE: INTELLIGENT ALL-WHEEL DRIVE
DESCRIPTION: To help maximize traction, available intelligent All-Wheel Drive with active twin clutch sends power to the wheel(s) with the most grip in slippery weather conditions and helps improve cornering and acceleration on dry roads.

TITLE: FIVE-LINK REAR SUSPENSION
DESCRIPTION: The available five-link rear suspension balances agile handling with ride smoothness and quietness to help ensure excellent driving performance every time you take the wheel.

TITLE: 2.0L TURBO ENGINE
DESCRIPTION: The 2.0L 4-cylinder direct-injected turbocharged engine delivers an impressive 250 HP without compromising on efficiency†.

TITLE: ADVANCED TRANSMISSIONS
DESCRIPTION: Regal Sportback treats you to smooth, responsive drives with its two advanced transmission offerings. Front-Wheel Drive models come with a standard 9-speed automatic, while All-Wheel Drive models feature an 8-speed automatic.

TITLE: AUTO-LEVELING TECHNOLOGY
DESCRIPTION: The available advanced LED headlamps feature an auto-leveling technology that helps you maintain continuous visibility when driving on uneven roads.

TITLE: INTERACTIVE DRIVE CONTROL
DESCRIPTION: Tailor your vehicle’s steering response, suspension and other driving dynamics based on road conditions — or your mood — with three interactive drive control settings: Touring, Sport and GS.

TITLE: 3.6L V6 ENGINE
DESCRIPTION: Regal GS comes standard with the robust power and torque of a 3.6L 310-HP V6 engine, and a 9-speed automatic transmission that enables thrilling, responsive drives.

TITLE: FRONT-PERFORMANCE SEATS
DESCRIPTION: The GS-exclusive racing-inspired seats are massaging, heated and ventilated, and feature electronically adjustable lumbar and thigh support bolsters to help you customize your command of the cockpit.

TITLE: SPORTBACK OPENING
DESCRIPTION: Discreetly integrated into the GS design is an innovative rear sportback opening. Wide, deep and spacious, the opening can accommodate cargo in various shapes and sizes — especially when the rear seats are folded.

TITLE: LOOKS TO THRILL
DESCRIPTION: From exclusive 19" wheels to a Sport mesh grille with Piano Black finish, every GS detail is an expression of its exhilarating driving performance. Distinctive lower rocker panels, front air scoops accented in brushed satin and a rear spoiler further enhance its sport car persona.

TITLE: INTELLIGENT ALL-WHEEL DRIVE
DESCRIPTION: To help maximize traction, intelligent All-Wheel Drive with active twin clutch sends power to the wheel(s) with the most grip in slippery weather conditions and helps improve cornering and acceleration on dry roads.

TITLE: RECONFIGURABLE PERFORMANCE CLUSTER
DESCRIPTION: Customize your view of important vehicle information, such as speed, fuel level and Navigation†, with the 8" diagonal reconfigurable performance cluster.

TITLE: DRIVER-CENTRIC TECHNOLOGY
DESCRIPTION: From an available multicolor Head-Up Display to an available built-in 4G LTE Wi-Fi® hotspot†, the Regal GS performance sedan keeps you up to speed with a full suite of driver-centric technologies.

TITLE: BREMBO BRAKES
DESCRIPTION: Regal GS offers stopping power that’s just as impressive as its heart-racing performance, thanks to Brembo® front brakes with dual-piston front calipers.

TITLE: SIGNATURE GRILLE
DESCRIPTION: With its intricate texture, Black Ice finish and three-dimensional chrome wings, the exclusive Avenir grille brings luxury to the forefront of Enclave Avenir.

TITLE: CAPTIVATING WHEELS
DESCRIPTION: Exclusive 20" aluminum wheels with Pearl Nickel finish are luxury in motion, giving Enclave Avenir an alluring presence on the road.

TITLE: THREE ROWS OF LUXURY SEATING
DESCRIPTION: Step inside the spacious Chestnut or Ebony-themed interior and revel in the soft touch of crafted leather-appointed first- and second-row seating.

TITLE: WOOD-TONED ACCENTS
DESCRIPTION: From the front doors to the center stack, meticulously crafted wood-toned trim accentuates the Enclave Avenir cabin.

TITLE: PREMIUM MATERIALS
DESCRIPTION: Enclave Avenir welcomes you into an environment of supple, sweeping surfaces, where each tone and texture conveys the highest level of refinement.

TITLE: WIRELESS CHARGING
DESCRIPTION: The details that give Enclave Avenir its elevated status are evident the moment you discover modern amenities like a standard wireless charging† pad.

TITLE: AVENIR SIGNATURE
DESCRIPTION: The Avenir signature is tastefully inscribed on both front doors, letting passengers know that a first-class experience awaits.

TITLE: ADVANCED SUSPENSION
DESCRIPTION: The available Continuously Variable Real-Time Damping suspension system helps enhance your control of the vehicle and deliver a smooth, confident ride.

TITLE: MOVE WITH CONFIDENCE
DESCRIPTION: Stay alert with a suite of available advanced safety and driver assist technologies,† such as Rear Cross Traffic Alert† and Lane Change Alert with Side Blind Zone Alert.†

TITLE: THE DRIVER’S CAR, ELEVATED TO A HIGHER STANDARD
DESCRIPTION: The First-Ever Regal Avenir enhances the superbly designed Regal Sportback with sharp, sophisticated styling cues that confirm it was crafted to a higher caliber.

TITLE: QUILT-STITCHED SEATING
DESCRIPTION: Distinctive quilt-stitched leather-appointed seats with contrasting French seam stitching exude richness and refinement. Available in Ebony or Avenir-exclusive Whisper Beige.

TITLE: HUSHED INTERIOR
DESCRIPTION: Settle into a cabin where conversations can flourish, thanks to QuietTuningTM technology designed to help reduce, block and absorb unwanted road noises.

TITLE: FIRST CLASS SEATING
DESCRIPTION: The Regal Avenir offers spacious, premium crafted seating for up to five passengers.

TITLE: SIGNATURE GRILLE
DESCRIPTION: With its intricate texture, Black Ice finish and mesh background featuring Buick’s signature tricolor insignia, the exclusive Avenir grille makes a confident statement wherever it goes.

TITLE: UNIQUE WHEELS
DESCRIPTION: Avenir-exclusive 19" aluminum wheels with Pearl Nickel finish masterfully blend style and function, and pair perfectly with this luxury sedan’s sleek, athletic profile.

TITLE: SPORTBACK OPENING
DESCRIPTION: Discreetly integrated into the design is an innovative rear sportback opening. Wide, deep and spacious, the opening can accommodate cargo in various shapes and sizes — especially when the rear seats are folded down.

TITLE: BRILLIANT HEADLAMPS
DESCRIPTION: LED headlamps feature auto-level and cornering lamp technologies to enhance visibility when turning or driving on uneven roads.

TITLE: REFINED PERFORMANCE
DESCRIPTION: Your driving performance will feel as refined as the vehicle itself, thanks to a 2.0L, 250-hp Turbo engine and a remarkably smooth 9-speed automatic transmission.

TITLE: INNOVATIVE TECHNOLOGIES
DESCRIPTION: A Bose® premium eight-speaker sound system, wireless smartphone charging,† built-in Navigation† and other standard amenities help you make the most of every drive.

TITLE: SOPHISTICATED SAFETY
DESCRIPTION: Whether you’re changing lanes or backing out of a parking spot, Regal Avenir helps you stay safe with its standard suite of active safety technologies.†

TITLE: AVENIR SIGNATURE
DESCRIPTION: The Avenir signature is tastefully embossed on both front doors and within the interior, letting passengers know that a first-class experience awaits.

TITLE: COMPREHENSIVE SAFETY FEATURES
DESCRIPTION: Anticipate the unpredictable with the help of available advanced safety and driver assist technologies,† such as Rear Cross Traffic Alert† and Lane Change Alert with Side Blind Zone Alert.†

TITLE: VERSATILE CARGO SPACE
DESCRIPTION: With the rear seats up, Envision can accommodate smaller cargo with its 26.9 cu.ft.† of space. And with the second-row seats folded down, Envision offers 57.3 cu. ft.† of space.

TITLE: 60/40 FLEXIBILITY
DESCRIPTION: For moreversatility, Envision’s 60/40 fold-flat rear seats offer the flexibility to accommodate a variety of cargo and passenger configurations.

TITLE: FOLD-FLAT REAR SEATS
DESCRIPTION: For drives that call for more cargo, you can fold Envision's second-row seats before entering—all thanks to its convenient release handles on both sides of the cargo area.
